jobDescription: We are now looking for a *Senior Product Engineer, Data Analyst *for Product Engineering Team.  As a Sr. Data Analyst, you will be working on our state of the art Tesla product for yield and test improvement. You will define product/test KPI, and help architect PDE database infrastructure to utilize volume production data for intelligent decision-making. Your analytical skill and data presentation will empower team to take our product quality and yield to the next level. *What youll be doing:  :
